title: I need help to find which section helps me report a player
body: I really want to submit a problem I have,about reporting a player but I don't know which section is it at?! Plz help{{item:3070}}

replies.body: The absolute best way to report a player is during the post-game lobby. Player Support specializes in helping with issues related to your own account, but if there is some really important info you need to share with us, go ahead and send it via "Game and Features > Feedback"

You know you can't actually send anything to Feedback. It just redirects you to the boards...

https://i.gyazo.com/f60d1ebb1752f985d08cb3a81e761b6c.jpg

You are right!
Substitute general questions for feedback and you should be able to move forward
